main event: Captain Barney Ross reported sightings of a disc-shaped object hovering over Holloman AFB, New Mexico on March 9, 1950.
interesting points: The object hovered over the base for several minutes before ascending vertically., The report describes the object's movements and characteristics as observed by Captain Ross., The sighting occurred at a prominent military location., The report notes insufficient data for further analysis., The source of the report was not specified.
witness description: Captain Barney Ross, approx 39 yrs of age, US Marine Corps (Ret)
